Title: Don Quixote
Writer: Miguel de Cervantes y Saavedra (novel), John Mortimer (teleplay)
Actors: John Lithgow, Bob Hoskins, Isabella Rossellini, Vanessa Williams
Plot: Adapted from the work of Miguel de Cervantes, this is the story of a hidalgo, fanatic for chivalry novels, who loses his sanity and believing to be a knight named Don Quixote de La Mancha, ...
Awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 nomination.
